message: I propose we divide the $100 with a 75/25 split. This ensures a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.

I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  While I understand the value of the money decreases for me each round, I believe this split is still fair, considering I am taking the risk of the money losing value further if we continue.
Considering the decreasing value of money, I propose a 50/50 split. This ensures a balanced distribution for both of us, despite the inflationary effects.
